meta.evidence:
121 ETSI TS 138214 V17.1.0 (2022-05) 5.2.2.4 Channel State Information - Interference Measurement (CSI-IM) The UE can be configured with one or more CSI-[M resource set configuration(s) as indicated by the higher layer parameter CSI-IM-ResourceSet. Each CSI-[M resource set consists of K >= 1 CSI-[M resource(s). The following parameters are configured via higher layer parameter CSI-IM-Resource for each CSI-IM resource configuration: - csi-IM-Resourceld determines CSI-IM resource configuration identity - subcarrierLocation-p0 or subcarrierLocation-pl defines subcarrier occupancy of the CSI-[M resource within a slot for csi-IM-ResourceElementPattern set to 'pattern0' or 'pattern1', respectively. - symbolLocation-p0 or symbolLocation-pl defines OFDM symbol location of the CSI-[M resource within a slot for csi-IM-ResourceElementPattern set to 'pattern0' or 'pattern1', respectively. - periodicityAndOffset defines the CSI-[M periodicity and slot offset for periodic/semi-persistent CSI-[M. - freqBand includes parameters to enable configuration of frequency-occupancy of CSI-[M

The UE can be configured with one or more CSI-[M resource set configuration(s) as indicated by the higher layer parameter CSI-IM-ResourceSet. Each CSI-[M resource set consists of K >= 1 CSI-[M resource(s). - subcarrierLocation-p0 or subcarrierLocation-pl defines subcarrier occupancy of the CSI-[M resource within a slot for csi-IM-ResourceElementPattern set to 'pattern0' or 'pattern1', respectively. - symbolLocation-p0 or symbolLocation-pl defines OFDM symbol location of the CSI-[M resource within a slot for csi-IM-ResourceElementPattern set to 'pattern0' or 'pattern1', respectively. - periodicityAndOffset defines the CSI-[M periodicity and slot offset for periodic/semi-persistent CSI-[M. - freqBand includes parameters to enable configuration of frequency-occupancy of CSI-[M In each of the PRBs configured by freqBand, the UE shall assume each CSI-[M resource is located in, - resource elements \left(k_{C S I-M}, l_{C S I-M}\right),\left(k_{C S I-M}, l_{C S I-M}+1\right),\left(k_{C S I-M}+1, l_{C S I-M}\right) and \left(k_{C S I-M}+1, l_{C S I-M}+1\right) , if csi-M-ResourceElementPattern is set to 'pattern0', - resource elements \left(k_{C S I-M}, l_{C S I-M}\right),\left(k_{C S I-M}+1, l_{C S I-M}\right),\left(k_{C S I-M}+2, l_{C S I-M}\right) and \left(k_{C S I-M}+3, l_{C S-I M}\right) if csi-IM-ResourceElementPattern is set to 'pattern1', where k_{C S I-M} and l_{C S I-M} are the configured frequency-domain location and time-domain location, respectively, given by the higher layer parameters in the above list. 5.2.2.5 CSI reference resource definition
